Name: Zignd
AboutMe:
A .NET developer that likes all things Microsoft and because of that I decided to make a career on top ofr their things, I can manage to think outside th their technologies. But I'm not completely blind fois scope too.

Nowadays I'm currently focused on web development with C#, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API and AngularJS. But I also have some considerable knowledge in XAML (WPF and UWP).

I also have some interest in mobile development, specially for Window 10 Mobile, and in building games, but I still need some time to learn more on those two.

I also have a GitHub account that I like to use to show things that I'm working on and to use as a portfolio (and it's not dead like most peoples GitHub accounts xD).

I can draw 7 red lines

And when I'm not coding I like to play video games (RPG <3, FPS, etc.), to watch anime, TV shows and to read manga.
